description:
Have you ever been confused about the "right" way to select rows and columns from a DataFrame? pandas gives you an incredible number of options for doing so, but in this video, I'll outline the current best practices for row and column selection using the loc, iloc, and ix methods.

This is video 19 of 30 in the series, `Easier data analysis in Python with pandas <http://www.dataschool.io/easier-data-analysis-with-pandas/>`__. The notebook and datasets shown in the video are available on `GitHub <https://github.com/justmarkham/pandas-videos>`__.
title: How do I select multiple rows and columns from a pandas DataFrame?
